translation: Has this been heard, O Arjuna, with one-pointed focus? Has the delusion of your ignorance been destroyed, O Dhananjaya?
commentary: 18.72 Kacchit whether? This this? heard heard? Partha O son of Kunti (Arjuna)? by you by thee? Concentrated onepointed? Chetsa by mind? Kacchit whether? ignorance delusion the delusion of ignorance? Pranashtah has been destroyed? And thy?
